title: Aquaman
summary: Arthur Curry learns that he is the heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, and must step forward to lead his people and be a hero to the world.

title: Homem-Aranha no Aranhaverso
summary: Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his reality and crosses paths with his counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat to all reality.

title: Vingadores: Ultimato
summary: In the aftermath of Thanos wiping out half of all life in the universe, the remaining Avengers must do what's necessary to undo the Mad Titan's deed.

title: Máquinas Mortais
summary: In a post-apocalyptic world where cities ride on wheels and consume each other to survive, two people meet in London and try to stop a conspiracy.

title: Bumblebee
summary: On the run in the year of 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small Californian beach town. Charlie, on the cusp of turning 18 and trying to find her place in the world, discovers Bumblebee, battle-scarred and broken.

title: Godzilla II: Rei dos Monstros
summary: The crypto-zoological agency Monarch faces off against a battery of god-sized monsters, including the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis, the three-headed King Ghidorah.

title: Venom
summary: When Eddie Brock acquires the powers of a symbiote, he will have to release his alter-ego "Venom" to save his life.

title: Capitã Marvel
summary: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

title: Vingadores: Guerra Infinita
summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: Robin Hood - A Origem (I)
summary: A war-hardened Crusader and his Moorish commander mount an audacious revolt against the corrupt English crown in a thrilling action-adventure packed with gritty battlefield exploits, mind-blowing fight choreography, and a timeless romance.
Scientists help the government investigate a threat beyond understanding.

title: Missão: Impossível - Efeito Fallout
summary: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

title: O Predador
summary: When a young boy accidentally triggers the universe's most lethal hunters' return to Earth, only a ragtag crew of ex-soldiers and a disgruntled scientist can prevent the end of the human race.

title: Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: A cop in rural town of Green Hills will help Sonic escape from the government who is looking to capture him.

title: Jogador Nº 1
summary: When the creator of a virtual reality world called the OASIS dies, he releases a video in which he challenges all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune.

title: A Justiceira
summary: Five years after her husband and daughter are killed in a senseless act of violence, a woman comes back from self-imposed exile to seek revenge against those responsible and the system that let them go free.

title: Deadpool 2
summary: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (AKA. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg, Cable.

title: Homem-Aranha: Longe de Casa
summary: After the events of Avengers: Endgame Peter Parker and his friends go on summer vacation to Europe and there Peter finds himself trying to save his friends against a villain known as Mysterio.

title: O Protetor 2
summary: Robert McCall serves an unflinching justice for the exploited and oppressed, but how far will he go when that is someone he loves?

title: Megatubarão
summary: After escaping an attack by what he claims was a 70-foot shark, Jonas Taylor must confront his fears to save those trapped in a sunken submersible.

title: Homem-Formiga e a Vespa
summary: As Scott Lang balances being both a Super Hero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.

title: Assassination Nation
summary: After a malicious data hack exposes the secrets of the perpetually American town of Salem, chaos decends and four girls must fight to survive, while coping with the hack themselves.

title: Os Incríveis 2
summary: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) is left to care for the kids while Helen (Elastigirl) is out saving the world.

title: Duro de Matar
summary: John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save his wife Holly Gennaro and several others that were taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

title: Pantera Negra
summary: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.

title: Mandy (I)
summary: The enchanted lives of a couple in a secluded forest are brutally shattered by a nightmarish hippie cult and their demon-biker henchmen, propelling a man into a spiraling, surreal rampage of vengeance.

title: Triple Frontier
summary: Five former Special Forces operatives reunite to plan a heist in a sparsely populated multi-border zone of South America. For the first time in their prestigious careers these unsung heroes...                See full summary »

title: Operação Overlord
summary: A small group of American soldiers find horror behind enemy lines on the eve of D-Day.

title: Legítimo Rei
summary: A true David vs. Goliath story of how the 14th century Scottish 'Outlaw King' Robert the Bruce used cunning and bravery to defeat the much larger and better equipped occupying English army.

title: Crimes em Happytime
summary: When the puppet cast of a '90s children's TV show begin to get murdered one by one, a disgraced LAPD detective-turned-private eye puppet takes on the case.

title: 22 Milhas
summary: An elite American intelligence officer, aided by a top-secret tactical command unit, tries to smuggle a mysterious police officer with sensitive information out of Indonesia.

title: Hellboy
summary: Based on the graphic novels by Mike Mignola, Hellboy, caught between the worlds of the supernatural and human, battles an ancient sorceress bent on revenge.

title: Shazam!
summary: We all have a superhero inside us, it just takes a bit of magic to bring it out. In Billy Batson's case, by shouting out one word - SHAZAM! - this streetwise 14-year-old foster kid can turn into the adult superhero Shazam.

title: Liga da Justiça
summary: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

title: Como Treinar o Seu Dragão 3
summary: As Hiccup fulfills his dream of creating a peaceful dragon utopia, Toothless' discovery of an untamed, elusive mate draws the Night Fury away. When danger mounts at home and Hiccup's reign ...                See full summary »

title: Han Solo: Uma História Star Wars
summary: During an adventure into the criminal underworld, Han Solo meets his future co-pilot Chewbacca and encounters Lando Calrissian years before joining the Rebellion.

title: Doutor Estranho
summary: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
summary: Thor is imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, and must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

title: John Wick: Chapter 3
summary: The third installment of the 'John Wick' series.

title: Dragon Ball Super: Broly
summary: Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.

title: Jurassic World: Reino Ameaçado
summary: When the island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

title: Oito Mulheres e um Segredo
summary: Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York City's yearly Met Gala.

title: O Peso do Passado
summary: A police detective reconnects with people from an undercover assignment in her distant past in order to make peace.

title: Homem-Aranha: De Volta ao Lar
summary: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

title: Millennium: A Garota na Teia de Aranha
summary: Young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander and journalist Mikael Blomkvist find themselves caught in a web of spies, cybercriminals and corrupt government officials.

title: Rampage: Destruição Total
summary: When three different animals become infected with a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop them from destroying Chicago.

title: Untitled Terminator Reboot
summary: Plot unknown.

title: X-Men: Fênix Negra
summary: Jean Grey begins to develop incredible powers that corrupt and turn her into a Dark Phoenix. Now the X-Men will have to decide if the life of a team member is worth more than all the people living in the world.

title: O Senhor dos Anéis: O Retorno do Rei
summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: Tomb Raider: A Origem
summary: Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father disappeared.

title: Homem-Aranha no Aranhaverso
summary: Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his reality and crosses paths with his counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat to all reality.

title: Dumplin'
summary: Willowdean ('Dumplin'), the plus-size teenage daughter of a former beauty queen, signs up for her mom's Miss Teen Bluebonnet pageant as a protest that escalates when other contestants follow her footsteps, revolutionizing the pageant and their small Texas town.

title: Um Pequeno Favor
summary: Stephanie is a single mother with a parenting vlog who befriends Emily, a secretive upper-class woman who has a child at the same elementary school. When Emily goes missing, Stephanie takes it upon herself to investigate.

title: Crônicas de Natal
summary: The story of sister and brother, Kate and Teddy Pierce, whose Christmas Eve plan to catch Santa Claus on camera turns into an unexpected journey that most kids could only dream about.

title: WiFi Ralph: Quebrando a Internet
summary: Six years after the events of "Wreck-It Ralph," Ralph and Vanellope, now friends, discover a wi-fi router in their arcade, leading them into a new adventure.

title: O Grinch
summary: A grumpy Grinch plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.

title: O Retorno de Mary Poppins
summary: Decades after her original visit, the magical nanny returns to help the Banks siblings and Michael's children through a difficult time in their lives.

title: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
summary: An anthology film comprising six stories, each dealing with a different aspect of life in the Old West.

title: Vice (I)
summary: The story of Dick Cheney (Christian Bale), an unassuming bureaucratic Washington insider, who quietly wielded immense power as Vice President to George W. Bush, reshaping the country and the globe in ways that we still feel today.

title: A Favorita
summary: In early 18th century England, a frail Queen Anne (Colman) occupies the throne and her close friend Lady Sarah (Weisz) governs the country in her stead. When a new servant Abigail (Stone) arrives, her charm endears her to Sarah.

title: Simplesmente Amor
summary: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

title: Férias Frustradas de Natal
summary: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

title: Deadpool 2
summary: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (AKA. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg, Cable.

title: Esqueceram de Mim
summary: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.

title: O Grinch
summary: On the outskirts of Whoville, there lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans on ruining the Christmas holiday for all of the citizens of the town.

title: PéPequeno
summary: A Yeti is convinced that the elusive creatures known as "humans" really do exist.

title: Podres de Ricos
summary: This contemporary romantic comedy, based on a global bestseller, follows native New Yorker Rachel Chu to Singapore to meet her boyfriend's family.

title: Bem-vindos a Marwen
summary: A victim of a brutal attack finds a unique and beautiful therapeutic outlet to help him through his recovery process.

title: Homem-Aranha: Longe de Casa
summary: After the events of Avengers: Endgame Peter Parker and his friends go on summer vacation to Europe and there Peter finds himself trying to save his friends against a villain known as Mysterio.

title: Green Book: O Guia
summary: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

title: Under the Silver Lake
summary: Sam, intelligent but without purpose, finds a mysterious woman swimming in his apartment's pool one night. The next morning, she disappears. Sam sets off across LA to find her, and along the way he uncovers a conspiracy far more bizarre.

title: De Repente Uma Família
summary: A couple find themselves in over their heads when they foster three children.

title: Um Duende em Nova York
summary: After inadvertently wreaking havoc on the elf community due to his ungainly size, a man raised as an elf at the North Pole is sent to the U.S. in search of his true identity.

title: Homem-Formiga e a Vespa
summary: As Scott Lang balances being both a Super Hero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.

title: Assassination Nation
summary: After a malicious data hack exposes the secrets of the perpetually American town of Salem, chaos decends and four girls must fight to survive, while coping with the hack themselves.

title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
summary: A faded TV actor and his stunt double embark on an odyssey to make a name for themselves in the film industry during the Helter Skelter reign of terror in 1969 Los Angeles.

title: Os Incríveis 2
summary: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) is left to care for the kids while Helen (Elastigirl) is out saving the world.

title: Natal Branco
summary: A successful song-and-dance team become romantically involved with a sister act and team up to save the failing Vermont inn of their former commanding general.

title: Meu Papai é Noel
summary: When a man inadvertantly kills Santa on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

title: O Expresso Polar
summary: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

title: Crimes em Happytime
summary: When the puppet cast of a '90s children's TV show begin to get murdered one by one, a disgraced LAPD detective-turned-private eye puppet takes on the case.

title: O Mistério do Relógio na Parede
summary: A young orphan named Lewis Barnavelt aids his magical uncle in locating a clock with the power to bring about the end of the world.

title: Uma Nova Chance
summary: A big box store worker reinvents her life and her life-story and shows Madison Avenue what street smarts can do.

title: Esqueceram de Mim 2: Perdido em Nova York
summary: One year after Kevin McCallister was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

title: Holmes & Watson
summary: A humorous take on Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's classic mysteries featuring Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson.

title: Como Treinar o Seu Dragão 3
summary: As Hiccup fulfills his dream of creating a peaceful dragon utopia, Toothless' discovery of an untamed, elusive mate draws the Night Fury away. When danger mounts at home and Hiccup's reign ...                See full summary »

title: O Amor Não Tira Férias
summary: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.

title: The Festival
summary: After Nick's girlfriend dumps him, his best mate Shane has the perfect antidote to his break-up blues: three days at an epic music festival.

title: Uma História de Natal
summary: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher and Santa that a Red Ryder BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

title: Sorry to Bother You
summary: In an alternate present-day version of Oakland, telemarketer Cassius Green discovers a magical key to professional success, propelling him into a universe of greed.

title: Meu Papai é Noel 2
summary: Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for nearly ten years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
summary: Thor is imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, and must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

title: O Lagosta
summary: In a dystopian near future, single people, according to the laws of The City, are taken to The Hotel, where they are obliged to find a romantic partner in forty-five days or are transformed into beasts and sent off into The Woods.

title: Operação Supletivo: Agora Vai!
summary: A group of troublemakers are forced to attend night school in hope that they'll pass the GED exam to finish high school.

title: Oito Mulheres e um Segredo
summary: Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York City's yearly Met Gala.

title: Mary Poppins
summary: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

title: De Ilusão Também se Vive
summary: When a nice old man who claims to be Santa Claus is institutionalized as insane, a young lawyer decides to defend him by arguing in court that he is the real thing.

title: O Grande Lebowski
summary: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

title: Toy Story 4
summary: When a new toy called "Forky" joins Woody and the gang, a road trip alongside old and new friends reveals how big the world can be for a toy.

title: Mamma Mia! Lá Vamos Nós de Novo
summary: Five years after the events of Mamma Mia! O Filme (2008), Sophie prepares for the grand reopening of the Hotel Bella Donna as she learns more about her mother's past.
